name: Vinsmoke Reiju
text: [Your Turn] [On Play] [DON!! -1]: If your Leader is [Sanji], activate the [Main] effect of up to 1 Event with a cost of 7 or less from your trash.

effect.text: If your Leader is [Sanji], activate the [Main] effect of up to 1 Event with a cost of 7 or less from your trash.

meta.notes: DON!! -1 means return 1 DON!! from field to DON!! deck as cost
